bibl.title: Letter from Tebetny to the Monks of Naqlun Concerning Fieldwork (P.Naqlun 39).
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: The letter, although written in very poor Greek and difficult to understand, is of great importance for the research of the history of the Naqlun monastic community. It contains the first attestation of the monastery's name (ἅγιον Νεκλόνιον) in a Greek text. The hierarchy of the addressees most probably reflects the organisational structure of the community. The document also bears testimony to the involvement of ""Naqlun fathers"" in fieldwork and to a significant role played by the community in local networks. Naqlun, 6th-7th c. - Avec résumé en anglais.
